item_0.name: How To Guides for Staff
item_0.description: Private

item_0.name: Gardening Calender
item_0.description: Here you will find a variety of tips and advice on seasonal jobs and duties as well as guidance on the right tools and equipment to last you the year round. This includes a month by month guide to some of the jobs needed in the garden as well as a variety of other articles. Some but not all the tools mentioned in the "Tasks, tips and toolsâ€¦" articles are on sale at Mow Direct, as these are meant as a general diary for all your gardening duties, but for any further advice on tools or equipment you are welcome to contact us or consult the articles in our buying guides .

item_0.name: Lawn Care
item_0.description: Whether you are a striped sward enthusiast or just someone who likes to play footie on the lawn with the lids, this section is here to offer you advice and help with maintenance and care for your lawn.

item_0.name: Leaf Clearance
item_0.description: Why should you clear leaves? What do they do to your lawn and what can you do about it? Find out here!

item_0.name: Top Tips
item_0.description: Brief, to the point and easy to read and digest, this section has tips and advice on how to use your garden machinery and get the best out of it

item_0.name: Firewood Preparation
item_0.description: From tree to kindling, this section will offer advice on chopping, preparing and seasoning firewood.

item_0.name: Mulching
item_0.description: Mulching for good soil preparation and improvement, mulching for great lawn health - this section is dedicated to all things mulch based.

item_0.name: Garden Improvement
item_0.description: This section is designed to offer advice on how to get the best out of your garden by improving various aspects of it. From making it bee friendly - good for the bees and good for your pollination - to creating quiet spaces for meditation or peace, to enhancing your vegetable plots, to looking after your furniture, shed or patio, this section covers a wide range of suggestions and techniques for improving and maintaining your outdoor space.

item_0.name: Tree Care and Maintenance
item_0.description: Here you will find articles and tips to help with tree planting, maintenance and care

item_0.name: Recycling, Clearance & Reclamation
item_0.description: Control your weeds, clean up the neglected corner of the orchard, re-use materials from your house or garden, reclaim space form nature gone wild and enjoy your outdoor areas even more - advice and help in this section.

item_0.name: Topiary
item_0.description: Topiary goes back a long way, as you will discover from our articles. The aim of this section is to offer advice and information about topiary and topiary tools to help you make the most of your hedges

item_0.name: Back-up Power
item_0.description: From generators to enable you to be on-line on holiday to essential back-up for power cuts and black-outs, these articles are here to help with all your generator issues.

item_0.name: Snow & Ice Clearance
item_0.description: When snow hits it can cause chaos so this section is here to offer help and advice on equipment and procedures for making sure you can clear up and carry on.

item_0.name: Outdoor Cleaning
item_0.description: Spring cleaning isn't restricted to your curtains and carpets. See what you can do outside the house, to make things bright and sparkling, in this section.

item_0.name: Returns
item_0.description: If you need to return an item to MowDirect please see the below information.

item_0.name: Reviews
item_0.description: Here Are Some Guidlines To Help You Write a MowDirect Product Review

item_0.name: I can't find an answer here, what do I do?
Ride-on Safety
item_0.description: These articles are aimed at helping you operate your ride-on mower or lawn tractor safely and comfortably

item_0.name: Lawnmower safety
item_0.description: This action contains some advice and tips on how to use your lawnmower safely

item_0.name: Chainsaw Safety
item_0.description: A chainsaw is a potentially dangerous pice of equipment, but with the right attitude and some useful guidance, it can be a joy to use and a very useful tool. The advice in this section should help you use your chainsaw safely.

item_0.name: Your Health and Safety
item_0.description: Lifting, digging, driving a ride-on, pushing a lawn mower, there are a hundred and one hazards in a garden. Although we have other articles in this Safety category that deal with some safety and health issues, this section is designed solely to help you avoid harm or ill health so you can continue to enjoy your garden for many years.

item_0.name: Cultivator, tiller and rotavator safety
item_0.description: Some general safety tips and information on safe use of your cultivating machinery

item_0.name: Snow blower safety
item_0.description: Here you can pick up tips on how to use your snow blower safely. These machine ware appearing more and more in the UK, so who not take this opportunity to learn about their safe operation.

item_0.name: Garden vacuums, blowers and sweepers
item_0.description: In this section you will find information about safe use of your leaf clearing equipment, from vacuums to blowers and from guidance on noise levels and protection to general dos and don'ts.

item_0.name: Generator Safety
item_0.description: Whether for leisure, hobbies, work or as a back up, it is best to know how to use a generator safely before you start. Here are some articles with tips for safe use.

item_0.name: Log Splitter Safety
item_0.description: Pick up some safety tips about using a powered log splitter, and learn how to make firewood for your stove or fire in safety

item_0.name: Hedge trimmers
item_0.description: This section will give you useful information on the safe and comfortable use of hedge trimmers, including how to avoid aches and strains from use and how to operate them correctly

item_0.name: About Mountfield
item_0.description: This section contains articles on our manufacturers and the brands we supply. This can include history and timelines of brands, manufacturing information, the ethos and intentions of the brand and product information.

item_0.name: Contact List Of Mow Direct Brands A-Z
item_0.description:
Here you will find contact information listed alphabetically by brand. e.g. Wilkinson Sword is handled by distributor EP Barrus but will be listed under W, likewise Karcher is listed under K though the contact is actually Handy Distribution. This means it is easy to find a brand for which you need information.
The brand contact information is also broken down into sections (A-E, F-J ) to make searching a little quicker

item_0.name: Technical Help
item_0.description: Some tips to help you make the right decision when you have a technical problem

item_0.name: Lawnmowers - Common Complaints
item_0.description: Here you will find a collection of issues actual purchasers have had with their mowers and our engineer's advice on what to look for and how to deal with them, from blade sharpening to remembering to switch the mower on at the plug.

item_0.name: Two Stroke Engines
item_0.description: This section contains useful tips and guidance on how to use, manage and work with 2-strok engines

item_0.name: Hedgetrimmers/Hedgecutters
item_0.description: This section offers useful tips and advice on maintenance of your hedgtrimmers/ /hedgecutters, so you can make the most of them and keep them working efficiently for longer.

item_0.name: Chainsaws
item_0.description:
Regular and efficient maintenance of your chainsaw contributes considerably to safety, but much more than that, your chainsaw will not work properly if it is not correctly, and regularly, maintained and will not be fit to do the job you bought it for. If you keep your chainsaw in good condition, oiled, checked and maintained it will last far longer and work more efficiently and safely.
NB: Some of this work can be carried out by you but some may need expert attention.

item_0.name: Brand Service Information
item_0.description: Here you will find detailed information about the servicing requirements needed to keep your warranty, and your machine, intact. This may includes detail of service agents, our service support, annual service requirements for each chosen brand and is part of our pledge to help keep your machine working at it's best.

item_0.name: General Advice and Information
item_0.description: Here you can find information on a variety of subjects, not strictly linked to 'How to..." Example range from information on looking after the integrity of the fuel in your machine to useful information about the development of garden technology, for example, the growing power of cordless garden tools thanks to lithium-Ion batteries.

item_0.name: Cultivators, tillers and rotavators
item_0.description: Advice and tips on maintenance of cultivators, tiller sand rotavators.

item_0.name: Cultivator, Tiller and Rotavator Operation
item_0.description: Some tips and advice on howe to get the best out of your cultivating machine.

item_0.name: Garden spreader operation
item_0.description: Here you can find tips and advice on how to use your broadcast or drop spreader efficiently.

item_0.name: Lawn Mower Buying Guide
item_0.description: This section contains a comprehensive collection of articles designed to help you purchase your ideal lawn mower. From information on power to a description of the comfort features found on handlebars, we hope these articles can help you make the right decision.

item_0.name: Ride-on Mowers & Tractors
item_0.description: Our guide to ride-on mowers & tractors explains everything you need to know to help you choose the right machine for you.

item_0.name: Brushcutters and grass trimmers
item_0.description: Find out about brushcutters & grass trimmers here and learn everything you need to know before deciding what machine is best for you.

item_0.name: Hedgetrimmers
item_0.description: Find out how to choose the right hedgetrimmer for you and learn about all the different types available.

item_0.name: Garden Vacuums, Blowers and Sweepers
item_0.description: Read our product guides on leaf blowers & vacs to find out how they work and what to look out for when choosing one. There are also some interesting background articles and more general tips on how to use them correctly and safely can be found in our 'Safety & Operation' section.

item_0.name: Chainsaws
item_0.description: A chainsaw is a major purchase and should be considered and taken seriously. This guide is intended to offer you hands-on help and advice so you can make your chainsaw purchase with confidence. For after-sales advice on the safe use and up-keep of your chainsaw, including some invaluable engineer's tips, check out our separate â€˜Safety and Operationâ€™ and â€˜Maintenanceâ€™ sections.

item_0.name: Cultivators, Tillers and Rotavators
item_0.description: In this section, we offer advice and help with purchasing tillers, cultivators and rotators for your garden, allotment or small holding.

item_0.name: Chipper Shredders
item_0.description: These articles will guide you through the wide range of chipper shredders we stock and help you choose the right product for you.

item_0.name: Hand Tools
item_0.description: Whatever your needs, from topiary shears to a good shovel, we offer some tips for choosing the right tools for the job.

item_0.name: Garden Sprayers
item_0.description: Here you will find information on all types of garden sprayers, comparisons of features, capacities and other specifications to help you make the right decision for your needs.

item_0.name: Tree Pruners
item_0.description: Here you can gather information and tips to help you make the right choice when buying tree pruners.

item_0.name: Other Garden Equipment
item_0.description: In this section you can find buying guides on our large range of garden equipment. From aerators to jerry cans and from hand tools to garden sprayers there is sure to be some useful information here for you.

item_0.name: MD FAQs
item_0.description: Here you will find questions posed directly to our sales staff and engineers from other customers, with answers that will hopefully help and advise.

item_0.name: Full Equipment Guides
item_0.description:
From delivery through assembly, including set up, preparation, your first use and ongoing maintenance and operation, these guides offers expert tips and information.
Using these you should be able to keep your machine in tip-top condition, use it sensibly, safely and efficiently and get the very best out of it.

item_0.name: General
item_0.description: Some general tips and advice about starting your machines, whether they be lawnmowers, chainsaws or scarifiers.
